definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Muckraking journalists denounced the titans of American business as "robber barons".
sentences.chinese: 八卦记者曾将美国工商业巨头直斥为“强盗头目”。

sentences.english: Title Technical Memorandum on Procedures and Methods for Sampling and Analysis of Trade Effluents .
sentences.chinese: 工商业污水采样与分析的步骤及方法技术备忘录。

sentences.english: 4 Get Italian politicians to stay away from industry and business.
sentences.chinese: 让意大利的政治家们远离工商业。

sentences.english: TES shall have the right to select the carrier of its choice.
sentences.chinese: 工商业污水附加费应有权选择其选择的载体。

sentences.english: The Results shall be subject to inspection and approval of TES.
sentences.chinese: 结果，应接受检查和工商业污水附加费的批准。

sentences.english: Industrial and commercial tax revenues are expected to hit 630 billion yuan for the whole year.
sentences.chinese: 全年的工商业的税收有望达到六千三百亿元。

sentences.english: We have an active and vibrant European business community in China.
sentences.chinese: 许多欧盟工商业正活跃在中国并发展良好。

sentences.english: We must avoid adopting any adventurist policies towards middle and small industrialists and merchants.
sentences.chinese: 必须避免对中小工商业者采取任何冒险政策。

sentences.english: The industrial and commercial problem was an important one that arose in the land reform in southern Jiangsu.
sentences.chinese: 工商业问题是苏南土改中遇到的一个重要问题。

sentences.english: American business and industry outpaced the world for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 美国的工商业一直执世界经济之牛耳。

sentences.english: Party's Tactics for Transforming Capitalist Industry and Commerce after the Founding of P. R. C.
sentences.chinese: 略论建国后党对资本主义工商业改造的策略思想。

sentences.english: In the event that TES decides not to proceed to the Repair Service step.
sentences.chinese: 倘工商业污水附加费决定不进行修复服务一步。

sentences.english: The company is now buying itself into American commerce and industry.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司正在买进美国工商业的股份。

sentences.english: Mr. Obama addressed the tragedy in a speech to business leaders.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马在向工商业领袖发表讲话时提到这场灾难。

sentences.english: It is this that makes the long-range speculations of statesmen and of businessmen especially hazardous.
sentences.chinese: 此所以政治家与工商业者所作的长期投机尤其危险。

sentences.english: Obama addressed the tragedy in a speech to business leaders.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马在向工商业领袖发表讲话时提到这场灾难。

definition: public utility/state-run enterprise/public foundation or enterprise, often charitable
national industry/industry run by Chinese nationals or ethnic Chinese
natural economy (exchange of goods by bartering not involving money)
